content.rendered:
HOLIDAY PARTY SEASON STYLE

The Holiday season is here! Time to celebrate the holidays with family, friends, and coworkers. With so many parties and so little time it’s best to plan your party looks early. Make a bold statement with feathers or beautiful bright colors this season. Check out all the party looks form Forward FWRD.COM and for fashionable gifts as well. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet?

Both looks are from FWRD.COM with YSL earrings. Top feather bag is Rosantica and the bottom bag is Jacquemus. Beautiful feather shoes are Amina Muaddi. The individual A-List Lashes are from the one and only D’Lashes.com/shop. Click on the bottom link to shop.

Get ready for more holiday gift ideas post coming soon! Wishing you all a very happy holiday season.

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? Book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

XO XO, DIONNE
